poem:
**The Game of Life**

In a lime-green house,  
blocks of life unfold—  
pixels pulse with desire.  
Virtual pools shimmer  
in the glow of flickering screens,  
where we click and drag  
our small, digital fates  
between work and dreams,  
shaping the tiny world  
until the clock strikes,  
and the game of days  
resets once more.
